roleset.name: hold and utter a belief
roleset.note: CONTEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'contend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'believe' and 'say'. Member of VNcls conjecture-29.5-2. (from contend.01-v)

roles.note: Might or might not actually take a hearer. See 'say' for examples of how to tag split/fronted/invertedconstructions. (from contend.01-v)

example.name: contend-v: basic transitive
example.text: [``The buyers walk away, and the specialist is left alone'' as the buyer of last resort for his stable of stocks]-1, he contends *trace*-1.

roleset.name: deal with, suffer through
roleset.note: CONTEND-V NOTES: Nominal 'contention' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls battle-36.4. (from contend.02-v)
CONTENTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT (from contention.02-n)

example.name: contend-v: transitive
example.text: It has also rattled Federal's strongly anti-union management, which-1 *trace*-1 is already contending with melding far-flung operations.

example.name: contention-n
example.text: On the contention over this issue , the blue and green alliances say that ultimately it is whether or not to identify with the " One China " principle , and it is essentially a dispute about " Unification or Independence . "
